requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7200U @ 2.50GHz (4 cores)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 M460
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64 Bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

results.name: the player shoots and can split up into 2 that combined are more powerful than the original, but its easier to die
